snippet: Wall Street banks are seeking until 2022 to offload investments banned by the rule, but the effort makes them appear to be trying to avoid oversight....
lead_paragraph: Wall Street banks are seeking until 2022 to offload investments banned by the rule, but the effort makes them appear to be trying to avoid oversight.

headline.print_headline: Banks’ Bid to Delay Volcker Rule Compliance Encourages Foes
headline.main: Foot-Dragging on Volcker Rule Gives Banks’ Critics Ammunition

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
